attributes.action: Introduce a new harder OFSTED with surprise checks on schools and harder punishments including the termination of sub par staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is worringly obvious that today schools are way below what they should be. this is because OFSTED does not work schools simply just clean up issues for a week or so while the inspector is about then they all come flooding back. We have sub par teachers horrible conditions and frankly usless support staff and terrible technology not to mention some sheeer useless headteachers.
